directions.text: Soak saffron in ½ cup of very hot water.
Process all paste ingredients minus vegetable oil and saffron with ½ cup water until a cake batter consistency.
In a large saucepan, heat oil over medium heat, pour in paste.
Rinse chicken and pat dry, arrange in a single layer in another shallow pan.
Add salt, and spoon masala on top.
Cook for 8 mins, then turn and cook for 4 more mins.
Stir to mix well, reduce heat to low and cook covered for 20 mins.
Add saffron water, garam masala, and cardamon powder.
Cover and cook, stirring occasionally for 22½ mins.
While cooking add water if sauce is getting too thick.
Remove from heat and stir in &frac3/4; cups of the cilantro.
Add remaining cilantro to the top of the dish.
